title: Gallery | iCyan Studio
description: A collection of my personal projects showcasing my skills and experience.

no1.title: Wowomap
no1.description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features responsive design and smooth animations.

no2.title: Goalbook
no2.description: This is a habit formation and goal achievement app designed to help users build routines, track progress, and achieve personal goals.

no3.title: Memolog
no3.description: This is a app for users to record vocabulary and phrases when they learn a new language. The app will help users to remember the words and phrases by using the test feature.

no4.title: Next-mailbox app
no4.description: A cross-platform desktop email management application built with Electron for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Integrated with LLM for AI features.

no5.title: Scam-check app
no5.description: An application that allows users to check their conversation history for potential scams. The app uses the Custom AI to analyze the conversation and provide a score indicating the likelihood of a scam.

no6.title: Nextjs-amplify cms
no6.description: A full-stack web application template built with Next.js and AWS Amplify, featuring a public website, blog system, and admin dashboard.

no7.title: Openmap
no7.description: A web application designed for testing and visualizing map data. Users can upload CSV files containing geographical data and view the information interactively on a map

no8.title: Chat app
no8.description: Base on the GPT API, delivering a natural chat experience. With your API key, you can choose different model version from openai gpt! If you want to adjust the accuracy of the conversation, a token count adjustment feature is also available for your own.

no9.title: Google trends Visualize web app
no9.description: Base on google trends API, you can search for any keyword and get the trend data. The data will be visualized in a line chart, and you can download the data as a CSV file.

gallery.title: Projects
gallery.description: A collection of my recent work and side projects.
